Sentencas: The oxygen electrode of the solid oxide cells (SOCs) operates under an oxidizing atmosphere.
Titulo: Boosting the electrocatalytic activity of NdBaCo2O5+δ via calcium co-doping as bifunctional oxygen electrodes for reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: Lattice shrinkage in a high oxygen partial pressure environment results in cation misalignment, leading to a decline in performance.
Titulo: Boosting the electrocatalytic activity of NdBaCo2O5+δ via calcium co-doping as bifunctional oxygen electrodes for reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: Addressing the drawbacks associated with A-site cation mismatch in LnBaCo(2)O(5+delta) double perovskite oxides for reversible solid oxide cells (RSOCs) oxygen electrodes, a novel calcium ion co-doping strategy is proposed.
Titulo: Boosting the electrocatalytic activity of NdBaCo2O5+δ via calcium co-doping as bifunctional oxygen electrodes for reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: This approach effectively mitigates A-site cation segregation and enhances stability.
Titulo: Boosting the electrocatalytic activity of NdBaCo2O5+δ via calcium co-doping as bifunctional oxygen electrodes for reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The glycine-nitrate method was employed to synthesize Nd0.8Ca0.2Ba1-xCaxCo2O5+delta (x = 0-0.2) layered double perovskites oxides co-doped with calcium ions, denoted as NCBCC.
Titulo: Boosting the electrocatalytic activity of NdBaCo2O5+δ via calcium co-doping as bifunctional oxygen electrodes for reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: NCBCC exhibits excellent compatibility with commonly used electrolytes.
Titulo: Boosting the electrocatalytic activity of NdBaCo2O5+δ via calcium co-doping as bifunctional oxygen electrodes for reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The doping of calcium co-doped in NdBaCo2O5+delta decreases the thermal expansion coefficient and improves the electron transfer characteristics.
Titulo: Boosting the electrocatalytic activity of NdBaCo2O5+δ via calcium co-doping as bifunctional oxygen electrodes for reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The sample with x = 0.1 exhibited an area-specific resistance (ASR) of 0.024 Omega cm(2) when operated at a temperature of 800 degrees C in air.
Titulo: Boosting the electrocatalytic activity of NdBaCo2O5+δ via calcium co-doping as bifunctional oxygen electrodes for reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: In the solid oxide fuel cell mode, employing x = 0.1 as an oxygen electrode, the maximum power density achieved was 766 mW cm(-2) at 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Boosting the electrocatalytic activity of NdBaCo2O5+δ via calcium co-doping as bifunctional oxygen electrodes for reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: In the solid oxide electrolysis cell mode, operating with CO2 and steam at an electrolysis voltage of 1.5 V and a temperature of 800 degrees C, the corresponding current densities were -1.51 and -1.85 A cm(-2), respectively.
Titulo: Boosting the electrocatalytic activity of NdBaCo2O5+δ via calcium co-doping as bifunctional oxygen electrodes for reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The incorporation of calcium ions into layered perovskite oxides offers a promising strategy to enhance the performance of oxygen electrodes in RSOCs.
Titulo: Boosting the electrocatalytic activity of NdBaCo2O5+δ via calcium co-doping as bifunctional oxygen electrodes for reversible solid oxide cells
